The NIU womens gymnastics team was on a roll last weekend with victories over IllinoisChicago and WisconsinLaCrosse while the mens squad stumbled against Penn State PERIOD

NIUs women ran away with the team competition totaling . while UWL was next at . and UIC trailed at . pERIOD

Vicki Thimgan came in first in vaulting for NIU with a . and Martha Unger finished with . on the uneven parallel bars PERIOD Thimgan also came in first on the balance beam with a . performance PERIOD

Laurie Vitallo tied the school record of . which was originally set by LeighAnn Carruthers against Southeast Missouri State Univesity  PERIOD

NIU boosted its dualmeet ledger to  PERIOD

The mens team found out it can improve its team total even on the road PERIOD Granted it was only a boost of . but the key was progress PERIOD

However that rise and even a split in individual event blue ribbons wasnt enough to earn NIU an upset of Penn State last Saturday as the Nittany Lions tallied a .. victory PERIOD

Waldemar Kolasa helped lead NIUs charge claiming firstplace finishes on both vault . and parallel bars . pERIOD In addition Carlos E PERIOD Fulcher ruled the floor exercise with his . performance PERIOD
